translation.en: Will you excuse me one second?
A pregnancy is brutal on your body.
There's also a risk from the hormonal changes:

translation.fr: des sautes d'humeuret de la dépression.

translation.en: Are you sure you still wanna be a surrogate?
If more than two embryos take, the couple may choose to abort some.
translation.fr: Le couple peut ne pas vouloirde tous les embryons.

translation.en: Now, he's gonna keep pushing her here. It's deliberate.
The girls always think they've made their decision to be a surrogate...
translation.fr: Elles croient être sûresde leur choix

translation.en: ...but a lot of them change their mind after about an hour with Carl.
translation.fr: mais se rétractentaprès avoir parlé avec Carl.

translation.en: She's 21. She lives here in the city, she's a waitress.
translation.fr: Elle a 21 ans. Elle vit ici,elle est serveuse.

translation.en: And she is brand-new. Just walked in today.
translation.fr: Elle est nouvelle.Elle a postulé aujourd'hui.

translation.en: -What would your choice be? -If the children were mine?
translation.fr: - Vous feriez quoi ?- Si c'était mes enfants ?
Ce ne sont pas un peules vôtres ?

translation.en: Life can take an unexpected turn.
If life worked out the way it was supposed to, I wouldn't be here.
translation.fr: Si tout allait bien,je ne serais pas là.

translation.en: Anna, why are you really doing this?
Because I have the opportunity to help someone who can't have a child.
translation.fr: Parce que je peux aiderun couple stérile.

translation.en: I don't like your interview guy. He is a bully.
translation.fr: Je n'aime pas le tonde votre agent.

translation.en: Oh, they're gonna wish they did.
I want you to bring Todd up to speed.
translation.fr: Il faudrait faire un topoà Todd.

translation.en: If we go to court on this, it'll be the firm sticking its neck out.
translation.fr: C'est risqué pour le cabinets'il y a procès.

translation.en: Now, this is still your baby, but I want a second pair of eyes.
translation.fr: Ça reste votre affairemais je veux un deuxième avis.

translation.en: He's putting Todd frigging Decker on my case.

translation.fr: - Je suis avec elle.- Qui ça ?

translation.en: It took forever to fill out the paperwork, and I was starved...
translation.fr: La paperasse a pris du tempset j'avais faim.

translation.en: ...so I dropped into that little diner where she works and she was here...
translation.fr: Je suis allée là oùelle travaille. Elle était là.

translation.en: ...waiting for her fiancé to pick her up.
I know, I know, I know.
There are a million things that can go wrong...
...and we still have to do the health checks and just everything.
translation.fr: et il faut qu'on fasseles examens.

translation.en: I just don't want us to spend another two years looking...
translation.fr: Je ne veux pasqu'on passe deux ans à chercher

translation.en: ...and maybe missing, and the whole time, she was the one.
But there's something else there, like...
translation.fr: Mais il y a autre chose.

translation.en: ...I know she can take care of herself.
translation.fr: Je sens qu'elle sait se débrouiller.

translation.en: I invited her and her fiancé Michael over for dinner tomorrow night.
translation.fr: Je l'ai invitée à dîneravec son fiancé Michael.

translation.en: Well, I'll tell you, when you move, you move.
translation.fr: Quand tu as décidé,tu as décidé.

translation.en: I'm sorry, but I just wanna do it right.
I really want them to like us.
I'm sorry if I overdid this. We could've just gone out.
translation.fr: J'en ai trop fait.On aurait pu dîner dehors.

translation.en: It's what I do, actually. I'm a chef.
I know it's just a meal...
...but I meant it to show you both how committed we are.
translation.fr: mais je veux vous prouvernotre sérieux.

translation.en: -One hundred percent. -But you will be carrying it.
In the service, I know a lot of guys who've done this before.
translation.fr: A l'armée, plein de gars font pareil.

translation.en: When you're deployed, it just makes sense.
translation.fr: Quand on est déployé,ça a du sens.

translation.en: When I'm gone, you two, you know, you come see her whenever you want.
translation.fr: Vous pourrez venir la voirquand je serai parti.

translation.en: I understand you'll be using the money to buy a business.
Oh, from my uncle. Residential and commercial roofing.
translation.fr: Celle de mon oncle.Une entreprise de toiture.

translation.en: He had quite the run here after Katrina.
translation.fr: Il a eu de quoi faireaprès Katrina.

translation.en: Owning the company means you get a piece of everybody's take-home.
translation.fr: En étant le boss,on gagne plus d'argent.

translation.en: Mike's always been real smart about money.
translation.fr: Mike a toujours étéun bon gestionnaire.

translation.en: ...we'll be able to put together almost $40,000.
And that's enough to buy the whole thing.
Anna, I'm sure there are probably some questions that you have for us?
translation.fr: Anna, vous voulez sûrementnous poser des questions.

translation.en: These renovations must have cost you a pretty penny.
translation.fr: Ça a dû coûter bonbonles réparations.

translation.en: Well, the house was part of Laura's inheritance from her grandmother.
translation.fr: Laura a hérité de la maisonde sa grand-mère.
Les rénovations ont été faites après.

translation.en: Must be nice to lay out that kind of cash.
translation.fr: Ça doit être bien de pouvoirsortir autant d'argent.

translation.en: Working by windows, you see a lot of things that nobody else would see.
translation.fr: Quand on bosse dehors,on en voit des trucs.
Elles fontcomme si de rien n'était
mais elles savent qu'on est là.
C'est le bon côté du boulot.

translation.en: That, there, isn't the right material.
translation.fr: Ce truc-là,ce n'est pas du bon matos.

translation.en: That gutter's leaking at the splice.
translation.fr: Il y a un joint qui fuit.

translation.en: ...we just wanna make sure that you and Anna are comfortable with it.
translation.fr: on veut être sûrsque vous êtes à l'aise.

translation.en: See, it's just that we're down to our last viable embryo, right?
translation.fr: Il ne nous restequ'un embryon viable.

translation.en: And we wanna make sure that you know how serious our intentions are.
translation.fr: On veut s'assurerque vous savez ce que vous faites.

translation.en: We tried for a long time to get pregnant.
translation.fr: On a essayé pendant longtempsde faire un enfant.

translation.en: It really put the two of us through hell.
I've never been able to give anybody anything.
translation.fr: Je n'ai jamais pu rien donnerà personne.

translation.en: Okay, just spill it, Taylor, you didn't like them.
translation.fr: Crache le morceau,tu ne les aimes pas.

translation.en: Okay, him. I mean, we go outside, right?
And he's talking to me about...
Maybe that's his way of bonding.
I don't know, babe. I mean, we can keep looking.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas.On peut continuer à chercher.

translation.en: I think doing something like this is really important to her.
translation.fr: Je crois que c'est importantpour elle de faire ça.

translation.en: Yeah, I know, it's kind of cute. I mean, you see...
...the way she left a price tag on the dress?
She wanted to wear something nice to impress us.
translation.fr: Elle a voulu faire bonne impression.

translation.en: I did that on our first date.
Oh, yeah, I remember that dress.
translation.fr: Je me souviens de ta robe.

translation.en: Matter of fact, I remember undoing it, like this.
translation.fr: Je me souviens l'avoir enlevéecomme ça.

translation.en: You were so bad that you were, oh, so good.
We're gonna do this, aren't we?
It's gonna feel like a little stick.
I'm placing the embryo. Don't move.
All right, we're done. You did great.
translation.fr: On a fini.Vous avez été super.

translation.en: People always talk about how they know the moment...
translation.fr: Les gens disent se rappelerdu moment
où a été conçu leur enfant.

translation.en: A wedding night or a special date.
translation.fr: Une nuit de nocesou une autre occasion.

translation.en: But I will know for sure...
The baby could be starting its life right now.
It just keeps hitting me how strange it is.
translation.fr: Ça me frappeà quel point c'est étrange.

translation.en: I mean, it's against the law to pay someone to have sex...
translation.fr: C'est interdit de payerpour coucher avec quelqu'un

translation.en: ...but you can pay a woman to get pregnant with your child?
translation.fr: mais on peut payerla grossesse d'une femme.

translation.en: -Imagine how it is for the boyfriend. -She said she loves him.
translation.fr: - Imagine pour le copain.- Elle dit l'aimer.

translation.en: She doesn't hesitate, doesn't question it...
She asked if it was the same with us.
translation.fr: Elle a demandési c'était pareil pour nous.

translation.en: When I was working on this room...
...close my eyes and imagine you in here, playing with our baby.
translation.fr: et je t'imaginais jouantavec notre bébé.

translation.en: We need to do more research on that section of pollution, 11.62.
translation.fr: Il faut qu'on se renseigne plussur cette partie, 11.62.

translation.en: Once we have that going on....
translation.fr: Une fois que ce sera fait...

translation.en: -You guys go ahead. I gotta take this. -All right, John.
-Hey, babe. Just got out of court. -John.
John, you're gonna be a father.
She took a home test. She took three of them...
translation.fr: Elle a fait un test.Et même trois.

translation.en: ...and all three of them were positive.
Oh, my God. I'm gonna be a father.
Anna's sitting here watching me bawl my eyes out.
translation.fr: Anna me regardepleurer à chaudes larmes.

translation.en: -I want her to go to Yale. -No, no. He is gonna go to LSU.
translation.fr: - Elle ira à Yale.- Non. Il ira à LSU.

translation.en: Anna's in the shower. She's gonna come say hi when she's done.
translation.fr: Anna se douche.Elle va venir nous voir.

translation.en: -Okay. You guys going to yoga together? -Yep.
translation.fr: - Vous allez faire du yoga ?- Oui.

translation.en: I didn't know how I'd feel about somebody else's body going through everything...
translation.fr: J'ignorais comment je vivraisle fait qu'une autre le vive

translation.en: -I really like you. -I really love you.
I didn't know he was here.
-He came home early. -No, Anna, this is-- Oh, it's--
translation.fr: - Il est rentré plus tôt.- Non, Anna, c'est...

translation.en: If this is right, they got nowhere to run.
Well, unless they draw Judge Steve Paulson.
He doesn't believe in corporate negligence.
translation.fr: Il ne croit pasà la négligence.

translation.en: Invite him to your charity event next month.
The man loves cocktail shrimp and the Saints.
translation.fr: Il adore les crevetteset les Saints.

translation.en: Will you guys just excuse me for a minute?
She told me to come. I'm sorry.
I had a doctor's appointment. Mike didn't pick me up.
-Come on, honey. -I grew up in a neighborhood like this.
translation.fr: - Allez.- J'ai connu ce genre de quartier.

translation.en: My father, he worked so hard, he didn't have that many days off...
translation.fr: Mon père avait rarement des congés.

translation.en: ...he used to pick me up from school.
God, I can't wait to do that.
-So you okay? -Yeah. Thanks for the ride.
translation.fr: - Ça va ?- Oui. Merci de m'avoir ramenée.

translation.en: Guess you forgot to pick her up.
Anything you need me to talk to her about?
Go in the house right now.
It's been a long day, cat.
What's troubling that pretty little head of yours?
Anna said she'd call me, and she hasn't.
She's young. She probably just forgot.

translation.fr: - Le bébé va bien ?- Oui. J'en suis sûre.

translation.en: The perpetrator, Mr. Mitchell, he'll be taken in...
...and charged with domestic battery. He acknowledged striking Miss Walsh.
translation.fr: et poursuivi pour voie de faits.Il a avoué.

translation.en: -You're not gonna let him out, are you? -He makes bail, we can't hold him.
translation.fr: - Il ne sortira pas ?- S'il paye la caution, si.

translation.en: -But he'll hurt me. -He tries to harm you...
translation.fr: - Il me fera du mal.- S'il essaye,

translation.en: ...you call us, we'll arrest him again.
You may wanna try to find another place to stay.
I don't have another place to stay.
translation.fr: Je n'ai nulle part où aller.

translation.en: I got him. All right. Get him in the car.
-Come on. Come on! Get in the car! -Anna.
You're okay, all right? We're gonna take care of you.
translation.fr: Ça va ?On va s'occuper de vous.

translation.en: You're gonna be fine. Let's get you inside.
I need you to listen to me, Mike.
I need you to really understand what I'm about to say.
translation.fr: Il va bien falloir comprendrece que je vais dire.

translation.en: This is a case for domestic abuse...

translation.fr: de voie de faitset de mise en danger du bébé.

translation.en: This is a letter to the DA...
...recommending no less than seven criminal counts.
So, what's gonna happen now is this:
translation.fr: Voilà ce qui va se passer :

translation.en: You're gonna stay away from Anna.
We're never gonna see you again. She's never gonna see you again.
translation.fr: On ne se reverra plus.Elle ne vous reverra plus.

translation.en: In 10 days, you're gonna be shipped off to the Middle East.
And when you return, your money's gonna be waiting for you.
translation.fr: A votre retour,votre argent vous attendra.

translation.en: Then I'm gonna make sure your punk ass is sent somewhere...
translation.fr: Je ferai en sortequ'on vous envoie

translation.en: ...that's gonna make the Middle East look like Club Med.
translation.fr: dans un lieu qui fera passerle Moyen-Orient pour le Club Med.

translation.en: She's sleeping in the guest house.
translation.fr: Elle dort dans la chambre d'amis.
- Où étais-tu ?- J'ai fait en sorte

translation.en: ...make sure Mike wouldn't be a problem anymore.
translation.fr: que Mike ne soit plusun problème.

translation.en: John, it's okay. You can admit it. She's beautiful.
translation.fr: John, c'est bon. Admets-le.Elle est belle.

translation.en: I guess if you're the type of guy...
An ass that you can bounce a quarter off of.
But I hadn't really noticed, I have to tell you.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas remarqué,je dois dire.

translation.en: Oh, sometimes I forget how good of a liar you are.
translation.fr: Parfois j'oublieà quel point tu mens bien.

translation.en: Anna, we'd like you to stay here with us in our guest house.
translation.fr: Anna, on voudraitque vous restiez ici.

translation.en: We'd like you to take time off of work. We'll pay you whatever you were making.
translation.fr: On voudrait que vous preniezdes congés. On paiera.

translation.en: ...so you don't feel trapped. Come and go as you please.
translation.fr: pour pouvoir sortir à votre guise.

translation.en: We talked about it. We feel more comfortable...
-...knowing you're here most of the time. -And knowing that you're safe.
translation.fr: - vous savoir ici.- Vous serez en sécurité.

translation.en: And he's not gonna be around anymore.
Not for a very long time.
Now, you are doing this incredible thing for us.
translation.fr: Vous faites cette chose incroyablepour nous.

translation.en: It's the least we can do.
Let us do something nice for you, okay?
Well, she is now officially better than me in yoga.
translation.fr: Elle est meilleureque moi au yoga.

translation.en: Well, she's 10 weeks pregnant. Give it another five weeks...
translation.fr: Elle est à dix semaines.Dans cinq semaines,

translation.en: ...you'll be able to take her down.
Because yoga's all about who wins, right?
translation.fr: Parce que le yoga estune compétition ?

translation.en: She says it's got her body going crazy.
translation.fr: Elle dit que ça rend son corps dingue.

translation.en: He just shipped out without even contacting her.
translation.fr: Il est partisans la tenir au courant.
- Prête pour le dîner ?- Fin prête.

translation.en: Laura, sweetie, come on, let's go.
You look like a movie star.
Listen, you have both of our cell numbers.
And we'll be home by midnight.
It's amazing the way he is with you.
And you have a good night.
-You too. Have fun. -All right. We will.
I am in control of my life.
I will experience the joy of pure love."
translation.fr: Je vais connaître l'amour, le vrai."

translation.en: I fall asleep there all the time.
I'd like a cup of coffee.
Doctor says I'm allowed one cup a day.
translation.fr: J'ai le droit à une tassepar jour.

translation.en: I was never really a cat person, but Laura loves her.
translation.fr: Je n'aime pas les chatsmais elle l'adore.

translation.en: All these years, she treated that cat just like she was her baby.
translation.fr: Elle a toujours faitcomme si ce chat était son bébé.

translation.en: But when the real baby comes...
...we'll have to see how old Miss Havisham reacts then, huh?
I told Laura she's lucky to have you.
translation.fr: Laura a de la chancede vous avoir.

translation.en: A husband who really loves his wife.
translation.fr: Un mari qui aime vraimentsa femme.

translation.en: Well, I like to think that I'm the lucky one.
translation.fr: C'est moi qui ai de la chance.

translation.en: I knew you would say something like that.
translation.fr: J'étais sûre que vous diriez ça.

translation.en: I'll show you what it feels like.
translation.fr: Vous allez voir ce que ça fait.

translation.en: He isn't even an inch long yet.
translation.fr: Il fait à peine deux centimètres.

translation.en: But you can feel where my tummy's starting to change.
translation.fr: Vous pouvez sentiroù mon ventre change.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. Yeah, I can feel it.
Can I admit something to you?
It's a little weird that I'm pregnant with your baby.
translation.fr: C'est bizarreque je sois enceinte de vous.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, that is strange, isn't it?
Because without you, we couldn't do any of this.
Hey, listen, next week we're having our annual charity event...
translation.fr: La semaine prochaine,nous organisons notre gala de charité

translation.en: ...here at the house. You should join us.
-What's it for? -We like to raise money...
...for the Boys and Girls Club of America.
translation.fr: le Boys and Girls Clubof America.

translation.en: You're amazing. Yes, I will come.

translation.fr: Je suis contentde te voir aussi.

translation.en: I'm so glad you miss me.
I mean, living up there in that beautiful big house, that must be nice.
translation.fr: Vivre là-bas dans cette belleet grande maison, ça doit être bien.

translation.en: Did you know that you have their only embryo?
translation.fr: Tu sais que tu as leur seul embryon ?

translation.en: -It's a baby now. -And they don't have any more.
translation.fr: - C'est un bébé maintenant.- Ils n'en ont pas d'autre.

translation.en: And in the eyes of the law...
...since it's inside of you, it belongs to us.
translation.fr: c'est toi qui le portes,donc il est à nous.

translation.en: We can decide to keep it for ourselves anytime we want.
translation.fr: On peut décider de le garderpour nous n'importe quand.
- Mais, je pensais...- Ne pense pas.

translation.en: So here's what you're gonna do.
translation.fr: Voilà ce que tu vas faire.

translation.en: Every single month, you're gonna say...
...that you're changing your mind, and you're keeping it.
translation.fr: que tu as changé d'aviset que tu le gardes.

translation.en: They've been really good to me.
translation.fr: Ils ont été très gentilsavec moi.

translation.en: John really wants to be a father.
What do you think is gonna happen, Anna?
You'll live happily ever after with him in that big house?
translation.fr: Que vous vivrez heureuxdans sa grande maison à jamais ?

translation.en: You are like a cow to him.
translation.fr: Tu es une vache laitièrepour lui.

translation.en: I'll do it. I'll do it, Mike. I'll do it.
I'll do it. I'll tell them.
I'll do it for you, baby.
It's from the firm. And tell Laura she absolutely tops herself...
translation.fr: De la part du cabinet.Laura se surpasse

translation.en: -...every time you guys do this. -I'll do that. Thanks.
translation.fr: - à chaque gala.- Je lui dirai. Merci.

translation.en: Nobody knows this yet, but Grafton Industries...
translation.fr: Personne ne le saitmais Grafton Industries

translation.en: -You're not gonna settle with them? -You kidding me?
All this time, you've been telling me we had them by the balls.
This is gonna lock up partner for you, John.
Look, I was talking to Anna earlier.
I didn't realize she was your second cousin, man.

translation.fr: - Elle est incroyable.- Elle a 21 ans.

translation.en: I'm just checking with you. You wouldn't mind if I asked her out, would you?
translation.fr: Je voulais voir avec toi.Je peux l'inviter ?

translation.en: No. You can ask her out.
Normally, this is the part of the evening...
...where John asks all of you to reach for your checkbooks.
translation.fr: où John vous demande un chèque.

translation.en: And I'm sure he'll manage to get that in still...
...but first, I wanted everyone to know...
...how important the Boys and Girls Clubs of America is to us.
translation.fr: que Boys and Girls Clubs of Americaest important pour nous.

translation.en: John loves children, and they love him.
translation.fr: John aime les enfantset les enfants l'adorent.

translation.en: I'd also like to thank all of you here...
Now you can all take out your checkbooks.
Is that the dress you gave her?
translation.fr: C'est la robeque tu lui as offerte ?

translation.en: You want me to go talk to her?
translation.fr: Tu veux que je lui parle ?

translation.en: That's not the dress I gave you.
It's just, the one that you gave me didn't really fit.
I was gonna ask you, but you were so busy with the party.
translation.fr: Je voulais demandermais vous étiez occupée.

translation.en: I can-- I can go change...

translation.fr: - tout de suite.- Non, ça va.

translation.en: Thank you for staying late. I appreciate it.
Well, no one fell in the pool.
I found it in your record collection.
Oh, yeah, she crashed about an hour ago.
translation.fr: Elle s'est endormieil y a une heure.

translation.en: Has to catch a flight at 6 in the morning for work.
translation.fr: Elle a un avionà prendre à 6 h.

translation.en: So how'd our little story hold up?
I was acting out a part.
I had a secret in me that no one knew.
translation.fr: J'avais un secretque tout le monde ignorait.

translation.en: It made me think that I made a good choice for the baby.
translation.fr: J'ai fait le bon choixpour le bébé.

translation.en: Well, I thought that we were the ones that made the choice.
You're gonna make a great dad.
Well, I'm glad it was you.
translation.fr: Je suis contentque ce soit vous.

translation.en: I am gonna take a bath before bed.
translation.fr: Je vais prendre un bainavant de me coucher.

translation.en: Something's knocking against the guest house.
translation.fr: Quelque chose tape encoresur la chambre d'amis.

translation.en: The guy in the gray suit? You know, he was staring at me all night.
translation.fr: Celui au costume gris ?Il m'a fixée toute la soirée.

translation.en: Had to be uncomfortable for you.
Can't blame a person for staring.
It just means they like what they see.
translation.fr: Ça signifie qu'ils aimentce qu'ils voient.

translation.en: Mike was the youngest guy I ever dated.
translation.fr: Mike est le plus jeuneque j'ai connu.

translation.en: -Is that your phone? -They'll leave a message.
translation.fr: - C'est le vôtre ?- Ils laisseront un message.

translation.en: So I have to go into the office today.
I got an important deposition. You can order out.
I'm not gonna be back until late.
How about we go out to the lake house?
translation.fr: On pourrait allerà la maison du lac.

translation.en: Just you and I, a weekend before the baby comes.
translation.fr: Un week-end tous les deuxavant la naissance.

translation.en: As soon as you get back from Houston.
John, you're not gonna like this...
translation.fr: John, ça ne va pas te plaire.

translation.en: ...but Chef Folse wants me out here tomorrow as well.
translation.fr: Folse veut que je sois là demain.

translation.en: -You're right. I don't like it. -Should I say no?
translation.fr: - Ça ne me plaît pas.- Je dois refuser ?

translation.en: Should I just come home now?
translation.fr: Je dois rentrer à la maison ?

translation.en: No, go ahead and stay. It's okay.
Chef Folse is offering me a major promotion.
translation.fr: Le chef Folse m'offreune importante promotion.

translation.en: That's the reason he brought me down, so he could offer me...
translation.fr: C'est pour ça qu'il m'a amenée,pour me proposer

translation.en: But I thought we talked about, you know--
We have six months before the baby's born.
translation.fr: Le bébé naît dans six mois.

translation.en: I told him I could run the company while we look for a permanent replacement.
translation.fr: Je vais diriger le tempsde trouver quelqu'un.

translation.en: Why not just turn it down, sweetheart?
I think I should take it...
...even if it is only for six months. But that's assuming you agree.
translation.fr: même pour six mois.Avec ton accord.

translation.en: I mean, I'd have to spend a few days a month up here.
translation.fr: Message de Mommy362Papa ! - cliquez pour voir la vidéo Je devrais rester quelques jourspar mois là-haut.

translation.en: But that wouldn't be until later in the year.
translation.fr: Mais ça ne va pas durer.

translation.en: And you could come up for some weekends.
Babe, are you happy for me?
-I really wanna do this. -Yeah, no, sweetheart. Definitely.
translation.fr: - Je veux le faire.- Oui, mon cœur. Vraiment.

translation.en: I'm-- I'm definitely happy for you.
And you like spending time with Anna, right?
She might even have a little thing for you.
I mean, you're a big boy, you can handle a little attention.
translation.fr: Tu es grand,tu peux te débrouiller.

translation.en: No, congratulations, sweetheart. I am so proud of you.
translation.fr: Oui, félicitations, mon cœur.Je suis fier de toi.

translation.en: This is me and Laura. She is my wife, okay?
This is our home. Do you not understand that?
translation.fr: C'est notre maison.Vous ne comprenez pas ?

translation.en: I don't wanna have to say anything to her.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas lui dire.

translation.en: No, wait, hold on. No, no. Please, please.
Maybe-- Maybe I said something to encourage you in all this.
translation.fr: J'ai peut-être dit quelque chosequi vous a encouragé.

translation.en: And if I did do that, then I am sorry.
translation.fr: Si c'est le cas,j'en suis désolé.

translation.en: Didn't wanna wait until tomorrow, so I grabbed the next flight.
translation.fr: J'avais hâte.J'ai pris le premier vol.

translation.en: Good. That's-- That's good. Congratulations on everything.
Laura just got a promotion at her company.
Well, it's only until the baby comes.

translation.fr: - Bon retour.- Ça fait du bien d'être rentrée.

translation.en: It's good to have you back.
translation.fr: Je suis content de te voir.

translation.en: Anybody wanna make me a goddamn quiche?
You're drunk. Okay? I was gonna call you.
Before they find out this whole thing's a scam...
translation.fr: Avant qu'ils ne comprennentque c'est bidon,

translation.en: ...you're gonna tell them that you changed your mind.
translation.fr: tu vas direque tu as changé d'avis.

translation.en: -You'll get them to give you money. -No.
translation.fr: - Tu vas les faire payer.- Non.

translation.en: And you and I are heading to Arizona...
translation.fr: Et ensemble, on ira en Arizona.
Là-bas, il y a un type
Si tu ne le fais pas,

translation.en: ...and I'm gonna tell Laura and John...
translation.fr: Je dirai à Laura et John

translation.en: ...you wanted to take their last baby from them.
Leave a message and I'll call you right back.
It's so goddamn typical of you.
Some asshole buys you some fancy shit...
translation.fr: Un trou du cul t'achèteun truc chic

translation.en: ...and you fall head over heels for him.
translation.fr: et tu tombesfolle amoureuse de lui.

translation.en: Hi, this is Laura Taylor. Leave a message, and I'll--
translation.fr: Ici Laura Taylor.Laissez un message, je...

translation.en: I can't hold the room. I'm sorry.
You know what, let's just go ahead and....
...just get down here as soon as you can.
I'm sorry. I had it in my schedule as 2:00.
-Maybe you just entered it wrong. -No, I didn't enter it wrong. I--
translation.fr: - Tu as dû mal noté.- Non, ce n'est pas moi...

translation.en: Damn it. I know I didn't. I-- I--
Someone changed it in my phone! I know that I put it in right.
translation.fr: Quelqu'un a changé l'horaire !Je sais que j'avais bon.

translation.en: I booked my flights around it! I know that I did! Damn it!
translation.fr: J'ai réservé l'avion en fonction !Je le sais !

translation.en: This is the only time we're ever gonna be able to do this.
translation.fr: On ne pourra faire çaqu'une seule fois.

translation.en: It's all right. Just don't worry about it.
Let's just go somewhere. I don't know, lunch.
I left a client at the airport.

translation.fr: Je suis tellement contente.C'est un garçon.

translation.en: I knew it. Let's have lunch today. To celebrate.
translation.fr: Je le savais. Si on déjeunait ensemble ?Pour fêter ça.

translation.en: Just you and me. I promise it'll be fun.
Because you shouldn't be calling me at work.
Okay? I cannot sneak away, I will not have lunch with you.
translation.fr: Je dois rester.On ne va pas déjeuner.

translation.en: I have appointments all afternoon. Like I said earlier--
-Anna Walsh. -Tell her I left for the day.
translation.fr: - Anna Walsh.- Dites-lui que je suis parti.

translation.en: -What is it? -Why are you lying to me?
I'd never lie to you, John.
translation.fr: Je ne vous mentirai jamais, John.

translation.en: I've always told you the truth.
All right. No, we're not gonna do this.
translation.fr: Non, on ne va pas le faire.
On ne va pas le faire.

translation.en: Nope. We're not doing anything fun.
translation.fr: Non. On ne va pas s'amuser.

translation.en: What a surprise. Laura's working late again!
Why did you think she would make a good mother?

translation.fr: - Ça suffit !- On est si différentes.

translation.en: I wonder if she actually even wanted to.
translation.fr: Je me demandesi elle le voulait.

translation.en: Are you sure she had miscarriages?
Because you know there are ways to fake that, right?
-Are you out of your mind? -You need to be nicer to me, John.
translation.fr: - Vous perdez la raison ?- Il faut être plus gentil, John.

translation.en: I will leave. The law says I can.
translation.fr: Sinon, je pars.La loi me le permet.

translation.en: This is my baby. Mike says we can sell it.
translation.fr: C'est mon bébé.Mike dit qu'on peut le vendre.

translation.en: Leave. Go. Get out of the house!
-You don't mean that. -Oh, yes, I do.
translation.fr: - Vous ne le voulez pas.- Si.

translation.en: I'll tell Laura everything. It will kill her. It will break her heart.
translation.fr: Je vais tout direà Laura. Ça la tuera.

translation.en: But you know what? We'll survive it.
We'll pick up the pieces and move on because that's what we do.
translation.fr: On ramassera les morceauxet on fera avec. Comme toujours.

translation.en: But what about you? You'll be alone.
You'll be broke, with a kid that's not even really yours.
translation.fr: Sans le sou avec un bébéqui n'est pas le vôtre.

translation.en: Hey, what's up? What, the old man needs another rock looked under?
translation.fr: Quoi de neuf ?Il faut vérifier autre chose ?

translation.en: No, actually, I need a favor. And it's not business.
translation.fr: Non, j'ai besoinque tu me rendes service.

translation.en: There's a guy I'd like you to look into. His name is Mike Mitchell.
translation.fr: J'ai besoin d'infos sur un type.Mike Mitchell.

translation.en: He's been deployed about two months. Just need a history on him.
translation.fr: Il est parti en mission il y a deux mois.Je veux connaître son passé.

translation.en: Anything you can find would be great.
translation.fr: Trouve tout ce que tu peux.

translation.en: I'm on it. Anything for you, John.
translation.fr: Je m'y mets.Je ferai l'impossible pour toi.

translation.en: Look, you know the firm monitors computer use...
The system's set up to automatically snag...
...certain types of files, things that could...
Todd recognized her from your party.
translation.fr: Todd l'a vue à la soiréede gala.

translation.en: She's not your relative, is she?
translation.fr: Elle n'est pas de la famille ?

translation.en: And I don't see how this is company business.
translation.fr: Ça ne regarde pas le cabinet.

translation.en: Anna has been getting prenatal care from a clinic...
translation.fr: Anna a été reçuedans une clinique,

translation.en: ...that happens to be a subsidiary of Grafton Industries.
She is a patient of the very people...
I'm giving the case to Todd.
I'm sorry, John. That video got bounced straight to the old man.
translation.fr: Il a eu directement la vidéo.

translation.en: I think I just lost my job.
translation.fr: Je viens de perdre mon boulot.

translation.en: You ready for things to get worse?
Remember that guy you asked me to run a check on? Mitchell?
translation.fr: Je devais me renseignersur un gars ?
- Oui.- Il y a deux ans,

translation.en: ...he was discharged from the military for some assaults.
But after I saw the video, I got to thinking about that girl.
translation.fr: J'ai aussi cherchédes infos sur la fille.

translation.en: Well, her real name isn't Walsh.
She got married at 19 in Little Rock.
translation.fr: Elle s'est mariée à 19 ansà Little Rock.

translation.en: Before that, she was Anna Devost.
Which is why the surrogate agency missed this.
translation.fr: L'agence n'a pas putrouver ça. DÉPARTEMENT DE POLICERAPPORT D'INCIDENT

translation.en: But not exactly the picture of innocence.
So I dug a little deeper.
Her parents died when she was 3.
She lived with them for 12 years.
translation.fr: Elle a vécu avec euxjusqu'à ses 12 ans.

translation.en: Now, this took some work to get to.
When she was 16, she attacks her foster dad...
The guy was sexually abusing her.
She's a minor, so the records are sealed.
But when she turns 18, she walks out and is gone.
translation.fr: Mais à 18 ans,elle part et disparaît.

translation.en: You're right where you should be.
translation.fr: Vous êtes là où il faut.

translation.en: And you slowly begin to reawaken yourself...
You appreciate your mind and your body...
...and then my mother and then mine.
translation.fr: ma mère l'a euet moi également.

translation.en: I always wanted you to have it.
What are you doing here in my office?
It wasn't the other way around.
You want to be a good man.
But how do you know you love your wife?
...what if you found out that this was more real?
translation.fr: et que vous découvrezque c'est plus authentique ?

translation.en: -Kiss me. -No, I'm not gonna kiss you.
Or I'll tell her things that will make her leave you.
translation.fr: Ou je lui dirais des chosesqui la feront fuir.

translation.en: ...nobody knows what's gonna happen in the future.
translation.fr: on ne sait pasce qui peut arriver.

translation.en: I mean, I know what you want.
translation.fr: Je sais ce que tu veux.

translation.en: But you're gonna have to trust me.
translation.fr: Mais il faut me faire confiance.

translation.en: I need you to go back to bed.
So will you do that for me?
-You asshole! -Whoa, wait a minute. Hold up!
You lied to me! Stay away from me.

translation.fr: - Viens là.- Je vais te tuer !

translation.en: Okay. Give me the knife. Give me the knife.
-Give me the knife. Give me the knife. -I wanna leave!
translation.fr: - Donne-moi le couteau.- Je veux partir !

translation.en: What the hell is going on?
Every time he screws me, that's what he tells me!
translation.fr: Il me le ditquand il me baise !

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -I hate you!
-What's going on here? -Please don't let him hurt me.
translation.fr: - Qu'est-ce qu'il y a ?- Ne le laissez pas s'approcher.

translation.en: -We got a call, a disturbance. -No. She is having our baby.
translation.fr: - On a été appelés.- Elle porte notre enfant.

translation.en: She has to come back inside.
He's been screwing me. Every night.
He told me that he loves me.
Come in the house. Let me talk to you.
-Sir, you need to step back. -Listen, she is carrying our baby.
translation.fr: - Monsieur, reculez.- Elle porte notre bébé.

translation.en: Sir, did you hear me? Step back. Now!
translation.fr: Vous entendez monsieur ?Reculez. Tout de suite !

translation.en: None of what she said was true, okay? None of it. Babe, she is lying!
translation.fr: Rien n'est vrai, d'accord ?Rien. Elle ment !

translation.en: -I never even touched her. -Whatever it was...
And now she's gone with our baby!

translation.fr: - Tu as couché avec elle ?- Non.

translation.en: Then why didn't you say anything?
I didn't wanna ruin the experience for you.
translation.fr: Je ne voulais pas tout gâcher.

translation.en: I thought that I could handle it, okay? I knew that I was handling it.
translation.fr: Je pensais pouvoir me débrouiller.Je le savais.

translation.en: And then it just.... It just got worse.
And then she threatened to take the baby and....
Because I couldn't have a baby...
translation.fr: Je ne pouvais pas le porter.
- Je ne suis pas une femme.- Non.

translation.en: -...that I can't handle it, you.... -No, I knew you could.
translation.fr: - Je ne pouvais pas.- Mais si.
- Je ne voulais pas tout gâcher.- Tu as menti.

translation.en: Baby, I just didn't wanna ruin it.
translation.fr: Je ne voulais pas tout gâcher.

translation.en: I wish I could say that it never happens, but it does.
So when does it become a kidnapping?
Even though it's your egg, fertilized by your husband's sperm...
translation.fr: Même si c'est votre ovuleet votre sperme.
mais il croît dans son utérus.

translation.en: The law views her as the birth mother.
translation.fr: Aux yeux de la loi,c'est la mère biologique.

translation.en: And when she gives birth, it is her child...
translation.fr: Quand elle accouchera,ce sera le sien

translation.en: Yes, thank you, I'd like to hold for the doctor.
Anna came to the office, caused a lot of problems.
translation.fr: Anna m'a causé des ennuisau cabinet.

translation.en: Think Cooper's gonna let me go.
translation.fr: Je pense que Cooper va me virer.

translation.en: Dr. Park just got a notice from a pharmacy in Mexico...
translation.fr: Le Dr Park a été contactépar une pharmacie au Mexique
- où Anna a acheté du Cytotec.- Au Mexique ?

translation.en: -No, she had it shipped here. -What is Cytotec?
translation.fr: - Elle le fait venir ici.- C'est quoi ?

translation.en: Well, it's normally prescribed for ulcers...
...but if a pregnant woman takes enough of it, it could induce labor...
translation.fr: mais on peut l'utiliserpour provoquer l'accouchement

translation.en: Where is the medicine being shipped?
I got the address. Let's go.
No, she's not here. Where are you?
I want you to come back.
Not to her. Just to you.

translation.fr: - C'est fou, non ?- On peut se voir.

translation.en: I can meet you today, right now. Where are you?
It can't be like it was.
I swear to you, if she does anything to hurt my child, I will kill her.
translation.fr: Je te jure que si elle blessemon enfant, je la tue.

translation.en: I think if she calls again, you know, I could...
...lure her to a public place, have the police there waiting for her.
translation.fr: la traîner dans un lieu publicoù l'attendra la police.

translation.en: Except she's not guilty of anything.
She ordered a drug to end the pregnancy.
You want me to explain that to a judge?
I mean, you'd win the case, but you'd lose your child.
She could kill your baby today.
You don't have time to bring this to the police.
translation.fr: Vous n'avez pas le tempsde la dénoncer.

translation.en: She was part of the scam and then she fell in love with you. That's what we have.
translation.fr: C'était un coup montéet elle est tombée amoureuse.

translation.en: She could have that baby any minute now. She could be disappearing.
Oh, that girl ain't going nowhere. She loves you.
You gotta put her at ease.
-You need to make her happy. -Make her happy?
Making her happy is not an option.
You're wrong. You're wrong. You give her what she wants.
translation.fr: Tu as tort.Donne-lui ce qu'elle veut.

translation.en: Convince her you're in love with her. Tell her that you're leaving me.
translation.fr: Elle doit croire que tu l'aimes.Dis-lui que tu me quittes.

translation.en: She is in love with you. If you make her believe...
...that you feel the same way, she will stay with you.
She will have the baby for you.
In her mind, I am keeping the two of you apart.
translation.fr: Pour elle, je suis un obstacle.

translation.en: You convince her that you love her.
When you meet her, you have to make her believe you.
That you want to have the baby with her and not with me.
translation.fr: Que tu veux ce bébéavec elle, pas moi.

translation.en: I don't wanna know what you have to do. I don't ever...
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas à savoirce que tu devras faire.

translation.en: But you do whatever it takes to bring my baby back.
translation.fr: Fais ce qu'il fautpour me ramener mon bébé.

translation.en: You should take her to the lake house.
translation.fr: Emmène-la à la maison du lac.

translation.en: Tell her that you're thinking of moving there.
translation.fr: Dis-lui que tu veux vivre là-bas.

translation.en: The new exhibit's right that way.
translation.fr: La nouvelle expo est par ici.

translation.en: Yeah, it was my father's. Laura hates it.
translation.fr: C'était à mon père.Laura la déteste.

translation.en: I guess I should've sold it...
...but part of me always wanted to live here.
God, I love it so much, John.
After I file those divorce papers.
I'm gonna make you so happy, John.
translation.fr: Je vais te rendre heureux, John.
Je veux que tu saches une chose.

translation.en: I can't stay long, because I told her that....
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas rester.Je lui ai dit...

translation.en: I told her I had to pick up some papers.
She's gonna stay at the lake house tonight.
She agreed to go to the doctor's with me tomorrow.
translation.fr: Elle ira chez le médecindemain avec moi.

translation.en: I'm okay. I'm going to St. Agnes Hospital.
translation.fr: Je vais bien.Je vais à l'hôpital Saint-Agnes.

translation.en: Come as soon as you can.
-I have to go there. -No. No, no.
I know, just trust me. Okay?
Excuse me. I'm looking for a patient. Anna Walsh.
-Are you a relative? Okay. -She's having my son, yes.
translation.fr: - Vous êtes de la famille ?- Je suis le père.

translation.en: -I got here as soon as I could. -Thanks for coming.
translation.fr: - J'ai fait au plus vite.- Merci.

translation.en: No, I'm sorry. I don't have a patient listed under the last name Walsh.
translation.fr: On n'a personnesous le nom de Walsh.

translation.en: Try Taylor. My last name is Taylor.
No, there has to be a Taylor or a Walsh in there.
translation.fr: Il doit y avoirl'un des deux.

translation.en: -No, I have neither. -She's not here, John.
Where the hell could she be?
Are you hiding in the pantry?
What the hell is that smell?
Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
Hi, this is Laura Taylor. Leave a message--
Please, come now. She's having the baby.
translation.fr: Venez vite.Elle accouche de mon bébé.

translation.en: She's dropping. Let's get those fluids going.
translation.fr: Elle a perdu les eaux.Laissez faire.

translation.en: Laura. Laura, can you hear me?
We got a female, early 40s. Possible head trauma.
All right, let's cross-type and match.
Doctor says you just have a bad concussion, some stitches...
I'm across the river at Montgomery Hospital.
Anna walked into ER in labor after she attacked Laura.
translation.fr: Anna est allée aux urgences.Elle a accouché.

translation.en: Gave birth to a healthy baby boy, according to her records.
translation.fr: Elle a eu un garçon en bonne santéd'après son dossier.

translation.en: She left later that evening and took the baby with her.
translation.fr: Elle est partie avec le bébé.
- Elle est où ?- Elle a disparu.

translation.en: I told the police to put an APB...
translation.fr: J'ai dit à la policede lancer un avis

translation.en: ...out on her in every city she's ever lived in...
translation.fr: dans les villesoù elle a vécu

translation.en: ...including that military base in Pensacola where Mike was stationed.
translation.fr: y compris à Pensacolaoù Mike se trouvait.
John, si elle a ce bébé,

translation.en: The lake house. It's gotta be the lake house.
translation.fr: La maison du lac.Elle va aller là-bas.

translation.en: -Please, I have to go. -I can't let you do that.
John, I am going to get my child back.
I let you come with me, but this is as far as you go.
Look, we know that she's dangerous.
I got you. Just get in the car.
-I got it. -Come on. We gotta move.
I am sick of you, you crazy bitch.
